sourcesContent:
/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard PRO React - v1.2.1 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-pro-react * Copyright 2021 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Container, UncontrolledCarousel, Row, Col, CardImg, Modal, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Button, } from "reactstrap"; // core components import SimpleHeader from "components/Headers/SimpleHeader.js"; import "./style.css"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; function Dashboard() { const history = useHistory(); const [editing, setEditing] = React.useState(false); React.useEffect(() => { setEditing(true); }, []); const redirect = () => { history.push("/admin/register"); }; return ( <>

Coding Souls

(Until Salvation)

Details

Vision

To provide the skills, confidence and opportunity to the students to shape the world by solving society problems through coding skills.


Mission

To develop the ethical coders on the latest technology


Core Values

Believe in learning together in friendly environment Inspire discovery and invention through play with work ethics Accept the transformation and respect all

Coding Souls

(Until Salvation)

Details

Objective

  • To Achieve Higher Logical & Structural Thinking.
  • To Create Incubation Environment for Skill Development.
  • Develop Creative Thinking, Constructive Knowledge & Develop Innovative Software Product.
  • To motivate students to learn programming with enthusiasm.
  • To provide real-world experience of coding to solve a problem.

Who can join the team?

  • Anybody can be a part of this club, who Are interested in coding.
  • Needs to take part in various coding events.
  • Wants to learn coding with fun.
  • Likes to get the latest updates of coding competitions.
setEditing(false)} size="sm" >

Notification

We are oganising the Hackathon on Date 24/04/2022, So if you are interested then register here

); } export default Dashboard;
